price: ߊ߬ ߞߙߎߝߊߢߐ߲߮ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ߣߍ߲߬ ߒߠߋ ߓߟߏ߫ ( ߊ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߘߐ߫ )
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
